panels.description: More than 10 superusers is already suspicious

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dbname,
  data->>'major_ver' AS pg_major_ver,
  tag_data->>'object_name' AS object_name,
  data->>'recommendation' AS recommendation,
  data->>'extra_info' AS extra_info
FROM
  recommendations
WHERE
  time IN (SELECT max(time) FROM recommendations WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY dbname)
  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
  AND tag_data->>'reco_topic' = 'superuser_count'
ORDER BY
  dbname, object_name

panels.title: Overusage of SUPERUSER

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dbname,
  '-' AS pg_major_ver,
  '-' AS object_name,
  'long running queries block autovacuum and thereby cause bloat' AS recommendation,
  'longest_query_seconds: '|| max((data->'longest_query_seconds')::int)::text AS extra_info
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
  AND (data->'longest_query_seconds')::int > 6
GROUP BY
  dbname
ORDER BY
  max((data->'longest_query_seconds')::int) DESC NULLS LAST, dbname

SELECT
  dbname,
  (select data->>'server_version' from settings s where s.dbname = x.dbname order by time desc limit 1) AS pg_major_ver,
  'autovacuum_max_workers' as object_name,
  'if most / all autovacuum worker slots are busy or AV runs for hourse then this could hint at incorrect AV params or too much workload' as recommendation,
  'max. active autovacuum workers: ' || max_av_workers || ' (of total ' || (select (data->'autovacuum_max_workers')::int from settings s where s.dbname = x.dbname order by time desc limit 1) || '); max. AV duration (seconds): ' || longest_autovacuum_seconds as extra_info
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  max((data->'av_workers')::int) as max_av_workers,
  coalesce(max((data->'longest_autovacuum_seconds')::int), 0) as longest_autovacuum_seconds
FROM
  backends
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
GROUP BY
  dbname
) x
WHERE
  (max_av_workers > 1 AND max_av_workers::numeric / (select (data->'autovacuum_max_workers')::int from settings s where s.dbname = x.dbname order by time desc limit 1)  >= 0.6)
  OR
  (longest_autovacuum_seconds > 1800)

SELECT
  dbname,
  data->>'major_ver' AS pg_major_ver,
  tag_data->>'object_name' AS object_name,
  data->>'recommendation' AS recommendation,
  data->>'extra_info' AS extra_info
FROM
  recommendations
WHERE
  time IN (SELECT max(time) FROM recommendations WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY dbname)
  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
  AND tag_data->>'reco_topic' = 'sprocs_wo_search_path'
ORDER BY
  dbname, object_name

SELECT
  dbname,
  data->>'major_ver' AS pg_major_ver,
  tag_data->>'object_name' AS object_name,

  data->>'extra_info' AS extra_info
FROM

WHERE

  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
  AND tag_data->>'reco_topic' = 'default_public_schema_privs'
ORDER BY
  dbname, object_name

panels.title: Unused indexes

panels.description: A lot of space / performance can be won on replacing columns that contain mostly NULL-s but are  fully indexed with partial indexes, leaving out NULL-s

panels.description: More often than checkpoint_timeout / 2. To improve increase checkpoint_timeout  or max_wal_size, which will reduce total IO amount done due to the way how Full Page Writes are handled.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  dbname,
  (select data->>'server_version' from settings s where s.dbname = y.dbname order by s.time desc limit 1) as pg_major_ver,
  'global server settings' as object_name,
  'Increase checkpoint_timeout or max_wal_size for more infrequent checkpoints, thereby reducing total IO' AS recommendation,
  'avg. seconds between checkpoint requests: ' || avg_seconds_between_checkpoints_reqs::int8 as extra_info
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  round((extract(epoch from max_time - min_time) / (max_req - min_req))::numeric, 1) as avg_seconds_between_checkpoints_reqs
FROM (
  SELECT
    dbname,
    min(time) as min_time,
    max(time) as max_time,
    min((data->'checkpoints_req')::int8) as min_req,
    max((data->'checkpoints_req')::int8) as max_req
  FROM
    bgwriter
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname IN ($dbname)
GROUP BY
  dbname
HAVING
  max((data->'checkpoints_req')::int8) > min((data->'checkpoints_req')::int8)
) x
) y
WHERE
  avg_seconds_between_checkpoints_reqs < (select extract(epoch from (data->>'checkpoint_timeout')::interval) / 2.0 from settings s where s.dbname = y.dbname order by s.time desc limit 1)
ORDER BY
  avg_seconds_between_checkpoints_reqs
LIMIT
  25

panels.title: Checkpoints requested too often
